title: The Bachelorette's Timm Hanly is knocked during a boxing match ahead of his stint on the dating show
text:
He was rushed to hospital during an intense rose ceremony on The Bachelorette after he 'felt like he was going to collapse'.

And now, it has been revealed Timm Hanly had another shocking scare in the lead up to his time on the show, when he was knocked out during a charity boxing match.

In exclusive footage acquired by Daily Mail Australia, the 27-year-old larikin appears to get knocked out cold almost immediately while taking part in the charity event.

It's a knockout! Timm Hanly (left) had another shocking episode in the lead up to his time on the show, where he was knocked out during a boxing match

The footage shows the fireproofer, with his trademark sleeve tattoos and top knot hair, bouncing around the ring as he dodges blows from his opponent.

After successfully fending off several quick jabs, Timm, who is clad black and white Everlast shorts, throws a punch, which leaves himself open to attack from his rival.

Seizing the opportunity, Timm's opponent throws a quick right hook, before following on with a left punch, which knocks him out immediately.

Proud fighter! Timm (centre) shared a photo from the fight to his Instagram account in June

Take that! Seizing the opportunity, Timm's (pictured) opponent throws a quick right hook, before following on with a left punch, which knocks him out immediately

As he hits the floor, Timm remains motionless in the prone position, while the referee waves both arms indicating that he has been knocked out.

The charity match, which was over in 50 seconds, took place just before the reality.

He later told an onlooker, who attended the previous match, he 'got stitched up' during the fight, and it was 'the hardest I've fallen until I met Angie'.

Tell tale signs! The video footage of the fight shows Timm (pictured), with his trademark sleeve tattoos and up-knot hair

The shocking footage comes after it was revealed paramedics had been called to the set of The Bachelorette after Timm collapsed following an 'intense' rose ceremony.

A source said of the incident: 'All of a sudden, he just legs it out of there - he didn't even say anything - and everyone was so confused!'

They added: 'Angie [Kent] kept asking the crew what was going on and they wouldn't say, so she just started to think he must be leaving the show - she was devastated.'
description: He was rushed to hospital during an intense rose ceremony on The Bachelorette  after he 'felt like he was going to collapse'.
authors: Mark Brook For Daily Mail Australia
